definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The relatives of the millet is gone, the villagers from back home.
sentences.chinese: 親戚的穀子沒了，鄉親們再從家裏背來。

sentences.english: I doubt if Flying Childers ever carried a peck of corn to mill.
sentences.chinese: 我懷疑飛童有沒有載過一粒穀子到磨坊去。

sentences.english: I have sown the millet in this plot.
sentences.chinese: 我在這塊土地上已播了穀子。

sentences.english: Eg: The farmer distributed the corn in the yard for the hens .
sentences.chinese: 那個農民把穀子撒在院子裏餵雞。

sentences.english: Haiti plane of millet, the first seed, and then planed.
sentences.chinese: 刨海地種穀子，先撒種，然後刨。

sentences.english: The 'rahm' was a kind of lumber-hole smelling strong of malt and grain;
sentences.chinese: 這屋子是個堆房之類，有一股強烈的麥子和穀子氣味。

sentences.english: In 2004 it was released by National millet variety appraisal committee.
sentences.chinese: 2004年通過全國穀子品種鑑定委員會鑑定。

sentences.english: Also disease resistance were linked with grain colour of varieties.
sentences.chinese: 不同粒色的穀子品種其抗病性是不同的。

sentences.english: Bayi's hens always ate the poor people's millet.
sentences.chinese: 巴依的雞專喫窮人的穀子。

sentences.english: The chickens will peck up all the grain that you throw on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 小雞會把你扔在地上的穀子全鵮起來喫掉。

sentences.english: Sometimes they imitate a turtledove picking up grain.
sentences.chinese: 有時他們模擬“斑鳩喫穀子”等形象。

sentences.english: Famers scattered corns in the yard for the chickens.
sentences.chinese: 農民把穀子撒在院子裏餵雞。

sentences.english: The chicken will peck up all the grain that you throw on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 小雞會把你扔在地上的穀子全部啄起來喫掉。

sentences.english: Like their ancestors, women winnow grain by hand near Lake Titicaca.
sentences.chinese: 和先輩一樣，提提卡卡湖附近的女性還是用手揚穀子。

sentences.english: One day, the couple herded chicken onto the grain-sunning ground to eat others' grain.
sentences.chinese: 一天，老兩口把雞趕到曬穀場上偷喫別人穀子。

sentences.english: Different ways of vigor testing on foxtail millet seeds were also discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文還對穀子種子活力測定的不同方法進行了討論。

definition: a rich farmer/to stress the importance of agriculture (in ancient philosophy)
to break out of an eggshell/to molt/to remove the husk/to shell
Kuanmiao township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
grain crops other than rice and wheat
yaodong (a kind of cave dwelling in the Loess Plateau in northwest China)/CL:孔[kong3]
